observation: Eastern Shore Regional GIS Cooperative | ESRGC  Eastern Shore Regional GIS Projects Data Services News Co-op Taking Partnerships Places Empowering partners to discover, create, share, and embrace data in their decision-making. Learn More Partnering with organizations and governments to engage in project work that covers a wide-range of disciplines. Read More Providing an extensive and ever-growing portfolio of GIS services and web applications. Data development, maintenance, distribution, and visualizations are just some of the offerings of the ESRGC. Premiere Projects Get Started With Us Delmarva Index The Delmarva Index provides users free and easy access to a curated list of relevant datasets and custom visualizations. Image Quick Q & A Frequently asked questions you may find helpful Who/What is the ESRGC? How do I partner with the ESRGC? What types of projects does the ESRGC engage in? Where We're Heading May 1, 2024 12:00pm Delaware GIS Conference The Delmarva GIS Conference is organized and supported by the GIS community throughout the Delmarva area. Hyatt Place, Dewey Beach, DE Sustainable Growth Workshop Chesapeake College Delmarva Alliance of Adaption Practitioners Salisbury University Contact Us esrgc@salisbury.edu (410) 677-5390 Office SU Downtown 212 W. Main St. Suite 305 ©

This suggests that the ESRGC is a legitimate entity. No scam indicators were found during the search, and the presence of the organization's active participation in regional GIS conferences adds to its legitimacy.
